#summary Instructions on compiling Wiiflow.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

1. Download and install devkitProPPC *r17* (Wiiflow is not compatible with r18 or later!)

2. Download [http://wiiflow.googlecode.com/files/libogc-21-09-2009.zip libogc-21-09-2009] and extract it to your devkitPro/libogc directory.

2. Download the source from [http://wiiflow.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ SVN].

3. Run Programmer's Notepad (installed with devkitPro)

4. Open the Makefile from the source you downloaded. Click Tools > Make.

5. Done!
